TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的颜色。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 颜色名称与 .NET Framework、Windows 窗体和 Microsoft Internet Explorer 颜色名称匹配。The Windows Presentation Foundation color names match the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and Microsoft Internet Explorer color names. 此表示形式基于 UNIX X11 命名颜色值。This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. 下图显示了每个预定义颜色、其名称和十六进制值。The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![预定义颜色](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "预定义颜色")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 颜色表，包括颜色样本、颜色名称和十六进制值Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 请参阅 类，以了解可为区域着色的各种其他更复杂的方法，包括渐变 ( 、 ) 或图像 () 。See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能在 XAML 中声明此托管类，但可以使用其静态属性在 XAML 中分配值。You cannot declare this managed class in XAML, but you can use its static properties to assign values in XAML.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AliceBlue As Color
public: static property System::Windows::Media::Color AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::Color get(); };
